content.text:
# 2025 President's Cup – Men's singles

Nicolai Budkov Kjær
| runner   =  Alexandr Binda
| score    = 6–4, 6–3
| edition  =
}}
Dimitar Kuzmanov was the defending champion but chose not to defend his title.
Nicolai Budkov Kjær won the title after defeating Alexandr Binda 6–4, 6–3 in the final.
Seeds
Clément Chidekh (quarterfinals)
#  Nicolai Budkov Kjær (champion)
#  Ivan Gakhov (second round)
#  Saba Purtseladze (first round)
#  Moerani Bouzige (first round)
#  Petr Bar Biryukov (first round, retired)
#  Abdullah Shelbayh (semifinals)
#  Ričardas Berankis (quarterfinals)
}}
